title: Greataxes
content:
ludgeoning Damage instead.

Many Greataxes have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Greataxes in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Cleave, Lacerate, and Prepare.

Battleaxes Clubs Daggers Darts Flails Glaives Greataxes Greatclubs Greatswords Halberds Handaxes Hand Crossbows Heavy Crossbows Javelins Light Crossbows Light Hammers Longbows Longswords Maces Mauls Morningstars Pikes Quarterstaves
